name: stabilized with magnesium nitrate (CAS Reg. No.: 10377-60-3) and/or magnesium chloride
FoodContactSubstance: A mixture of 5-chloro-2-methyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one (CMIT; CAS Reg. No. 26172-55-4) and 2-methyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one (MIT; CAS Reg. No. 2682-20-4) at a ratio of 3 parts to 1 part by weight, stabilized with magnesium nitrate (CAS Reg. No.: 10377-60-3) and/or magnesium chloride (CAS Reg. No. 7786-30-3), and further stabilized with 0.15% copper (II) nitrate (CAS Reg. No.: 19004-19-4).
